channel.title: VIM on MILAI AI
channel.description: Recent content in VIM on MILAI AI

item.title: Ctags-VIM
item.description: Command Function Ctrl + ] Go to definition Ctrl + T Jump back from the definition Ctrl + W Ctrl + ] Open the definition in a horizontal split :ts <tag_name> List the tags that match <tag_name> :tn Jump to the next matching tag :tp Jump to the previous matching tag Shortcuts Ctrl+] : 取出当前光标下的word作为ta
